DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy SPD489 treatment executive function impairment ( EFI ) use adjunct stable , standard therapy set partial full remission recurrent Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) measure Global Executive Composite ( GEC ) T-score Behavioral Rating Inventory Executive Functioning - Adult Version ( BRIEF-A ) .
DOC.brief_title: SPD489 Adults With Persistent Executive Function Impairments ( EFI ) Partial Full Remission Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Adults age 1855 primary diagnosis nonpsychotic unipolar depression Current comorbid psychiatric disorder
